item.title: I need some help (matrix)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Everyone is leeching Matrix source, if you're planning on hosting it please don't, you'll own waste your own life on it. For these reasons... You'll get no players, because almost everyone has it, (but only half know how to get it running :P), no variety, and I'm [b]POSITIVE[/b] you'll run into worst problems then this.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help (matrix)
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“JZombie37, post:3, topic:449891”]if (getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“username”) && (getRights() == 2)) {
for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) {
p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=7><col=FF1493><shad=000000> Owner" + getUsername() + " has logged in.");
}[/quote]
Everyone is leeching Matrix source, if you’re plaining on hosting it please don’t, you’ll own waste your own life on it. For these reasons…
You’ll get no players, because almost everyone has it, (but only half know how to get it running :P), no variety, and I’m pretty sure you’ll run into worst problems then this.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help (matrix)
item.dc:creator: @antrexica antrexica
item.description:
@antrexica wrote:

im trying to get this in

if (Player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“Angel”)) {

                            for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) {
                            p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<col=FF0004><shad=000000>Owner " + getUsername() + " has logged in.");
             		}
		}

its a send message when i log in but

i get 1 error

and cant seem to figure it out because im new any help??

HERE IS THE ERROR

Compiling Matrix…
src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:663: error: non-static method getUsername() c
annot be referenced from a static context
if (Player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“Angel”)) {
^
1 error

Press any key to continue . . .
